Common Questions

  1. Why doesn't my method annotated with @TriggersRemove actually trigger a cache remove?

Answers

  1. Make sure your method annotated with @TriggersRemove has the same arguments (type, number, and order) as another @Cacheable method. Don't put @TriggersRemove on any method also marked @Cacheable, as it will do exactly that.
